ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage
n: Big Kev's Texas Style Long Island Iced Tea
des: "This Long Island Iced Tea Recipe is sure to make you party like you are from Texas!"
ins: Pour vodka, gin, triple sec, rum, and tequila into a tall glass with ice. Top off with cola. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon and lime wedges.
